top_categories.workout_context: Scratch Ankle Gravel rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Scratch Ankle Gravel’s florida panhandle, southern gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Scratch Ankle Gravel isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Scratch Ankle Gravel’s florida panhandle gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Scratch Ankle Gravel’s florida panhandle gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Scratch Ankle Gravel when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Scratch Ankle Gravel. Make this intensity feel like home.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Scratch Ankle Gravel — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Every session at Scratch Ankle Gravel intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
The varied gradients at Scratch Ankle Gravel reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Scratch Ankle Gravel — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on florida panhandle gravel.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Scratch Ankle Gravel — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Scratch Ankle Gravel’s 45 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 45 miles of florida panhandle gravel in Milton, FL.
